name: Water vs Fire (AMFJ)
description:
The game is about character as water and character as fire which they fight each other and the winner who kills the other player first ,,

,,

For Fire Player Use : ( "AD" to move "W" to jump and "S" to SHOOT)

For Water Player Use : ("←→" to move "↑" to jump and "↓" to SHOOT)

" TWO PLAYER PLAY ON THE SAME TIME "
